Sentencas: The phase composition, structure, conductivity, crack resistance, and microhardness of crystals (ZrO2)1-x(R2O3)x, where R = Y, Gd, Sm, and (x = 0.03, 0.04, 0.05) were studied.
Titulo: Solid electrolytes based on zirconium dioxide partially stabilized with oxides of yttrium, gadolinium, and samarium

Sentencas: Crystals were grown by directed crystallization of the melt in a cold crucible.
Titulo: Solid electrolytes based on zirconium dioxide partially stabilized with oxides of yttrium, gadolinium, and samarium

Sentencas: Crystals were studied by X-ray diffraction, transmission electron microscopy, impedance spectroscopy, and indentation.
Titulo: Solid electrolytes based on zirconium dioxide partially stabilized with oxides of yttrium, gadolinium, and samarium

Sentencas: The concentration dependences of the investigated characteristics of crystals are obtained.
Titulo: Solid electrolytes based on zirconium dioxide partially stabilized with oxides of yttrium, gadolinium, and samarium

Sentencas: It has been shown that an increase in the concentration of the stabilizing oxide in all cases leads to a decrease in the amount of the transformed t-phase and reduces the value of the crack resistance of the crystals.
Titulo: Solid electrolytes based on zirconium dioxide partially stabilized with oxides of yttrium, gadolinium, and samarium

Sentencas: In this case, a decrease in the size of the twins and an increase in the defectiveness of the structure are observed, which is accompanied by a slight decrease in the electrical conductivity of tetragonal solid solutions.
Titulo: Solid electrolytes based on zirconium dioxide partially stabilized with oxides of yttrium, gadolinium, and samarium

Sentencas: The influence of the ionic radius of trivalent cations on the stabilization of tetragonal phases, conductivity, and the mechanical properties of crystals is discussed.
Titulo: Solid electrolytes based on zirconium dioxide partially stabilized with oxides of yttrium, gadolinium, and samarium

Sentencas: An increase in the values of crack resistance and a decrease in the values of high-temperature electrical conductivity of tetragonal solid solutions in the series Y2O3 -> Gd2O3 -> Sm2O3 at comparable concentrations of stabilizing oxides were established.
Titulo: Solid electrolytes based on zirconium dioxide partially stabilized with oxides of yttrium, gadolinium, and samarium

Sentencas: It has been shown that ZrO2 solid solutions stabilized with Sm2O3 can be used as functional supporting membranes in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Solid electrolytes based on zirconium dioxide partially stabilized with oxides of yttrium, gadolinium, and samarium
